khosla.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • khosla.shapes.Shape
      • khosla.shapes.Shape2D
        • khosla.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape2D
    This class represents a rectangle.
    Version:
    September 19th 2017
    Author:
    mkhosla770

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero, stroke color to black, and fill color to white.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero, stroke color to black, and fill color to white.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height. Also sets stroke color to black and fill color to white.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the upper left corner of the Rectangle.
        y - The y coordinate of the upper left corner of the Rectangle.
        width - The width of the Rectangle.
        height - The height of the Rectangle.

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the shape.
        Specified by:
        getPerimeter in class Shape2D
        Returns:
        The perimeter of the shape.

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the shape.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        The area of the shape.

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this rectangle
        Specified by:
        isPointInside in class Shape2D
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point
        y - The y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        Whether or not the point is inside the Rectangle.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        marker - The PApplet used to draw the Rectangle by accessing the processing package.
        Precondition:
        marker must not be null
        Postcondition:
        the stroke and fill of the marker are either set to white or to a specified color (depending on whether or not the setColor method was called). RectMode is set to PApplet.CORNER
